# [Interview #49: LOC Signing Report - Matthew Hunter, Entry #3](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=49#3)

#### Robert Jordan

He mentioned "Never trust anyone with power who isn't uncomfortable with it" as being related to Rand's leaving so many
*sa'angreal*
in safe places...
